General.Name: Henan Dayou Energy Co Ltd
General.Description: Henan Dayou Energy Co., Ltd engages in raw coal mining activities in China. It is involved in mining, washing, processing, and wholesale of coal. The company offers long flame, coking, lean, and cleaned coal for use in various industries, including power generation, gas production, industrial boilers, coking, building materials, and other industries. It also provides coal transportation services; technical and consulting services; water intake, water supply, and heating services; and equipment and house leasing services. The company was formerly known as Nanjing Xinwang Telecom Tech Co.,Ltd and changed its name to Henan Dayou Energy Co., Ltd in 2010. Henan Dayou Energy Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is based in Yima, China. Henan Dayou Energy Co., Ltd is a subsidiary of Yima Coal Industry Group Co., Ltd.

1.Name: Mr. Hongtao  Tan
1.Title: Financial Director & Head of Financial Assets Department
